column2: Safety Role & responsibilities     Developing and implementing health and safety plans, enforcing policies, and evaluating practices and facilities to ensure compliance with legal guidelines.  Ensuresthe corporate guidelines, the implementation, updating, review and auditing of the Company HSE Systems. Implementation of Safety Norms as per permission conditions and to ensure safety at the project site.  Handle all OSHA related issues such as inspections, yearly reports, job site posters, citations, hearings, etc. Performs field safety audits to ensure compliance with all OSHA, State, Local and company safety rules and regulations Quality Assurance and Quality Control (QA&QC) official oversees the facility's strategies, objectives and operational status to ensure high-quality processes and products. Establishing Quality Standards of CI and MI. Developing Quality Processes and Procedures for smart meter survey and installation. Conducting Quality Audits and Inspections. Implementing Corrective and Preventive Actions. Performance Monitoring and Reporting. Ensuring daily Pep talk regarding quality work at site. Preferred candidate profile   Candidate having experience in handling Smart Meters & can ensure the Quality & Safety norms. Also candidates having Bachelors degree in occupational health and safety, Environmental Science or a related field can apply.
